title.rendered: Watch Caldwell Night Rodeo 2022 live stream CNR online

content.rendered:
Rodeo fans can’t exhaust all the cowboys and cowgirls’ competitions featured within the United States. And every August of each year, they get to experience exciting actions of the Caldwell Night Rodeo.

Watch NFR 2023 Live Online - SUBSCRIBE HERE

NFR 2023 Streaming info
Streaming
The Cowboy Channel (real-time) Watch Here
RFD-TV (real-time) Watch Here
Cowboy Channel Plus (International) Watch Here

 

The 2021 event is bygones, and we are currently waiting for the 2022 event that will start on Tuesday, August 16- Saturday, August 20, at the Caldwell Night Rodeo Arena, Caldwell, Idaho. 

The first rodeo event in the Pacific Northwest to be hosted under lights is the Caldwell Night Rodeo. Ever since then, many record-breaking rides have lit up the arena. Over the last 15 years, the rodeo has grown in popularity and size and has been nominated seven times for the popular PRCA award for Top Large Outdoor Rodeo.

Rodeo fans from around the USA converge on Canyon County for the annual Caldwell Night Rodeo over five action-packed nights, making it one of the longest-running annual events in Canyon County. The Caldwell Night Rodeo ranks among the Top 5 Large Outdoor Rodeos and Top 20 Professional Rodeos in the country. This event is an annual stop on the professional rodeo tour packed with exciting competitions and activities.

2021 Caldwell Night Rodeo
Venue Caldwell Night Rodeo Arena, Caldwell, ID
Start Date 17 August, 2021
End Date 21 August, 2021, 2021
Start Time 3:30 p.m. – 9:45 p.m. ET
Sanctions PRCA, WPRA
TV Broadcast TCC & TCC+

When is the Caldwell Night Rodeo 2022?

During the five days between August 16- 20, 2022, there will be various sponsored activities for fans planning to attend the Caldwell Night Rodeo festivities in Caldwell, Idaho. The performances are expected to start between 3:30 pm – 9:45 pm (ET).

Where will the CNR 2022 be held?

If you want to watch CNR 2022, Caldwell Night Rodeo Arena, located in Caldwell, Idaho, is where you must be.

One of the most significant rodeo annual events in Canyon Country is the CNR, held every year in August. Stay tuned for the 2022 event, which will start with junior rodeo events at 6:30 pm, and main performances at 8:00 pm each night.

Where is the Caldwell Night Rodeo Grounds?

The Caldwell Night Rodeo Grounds address is 2207 Blaine St Caldwell ID 83605, Caldwell, ID 83605, United States.

Getting to the CNR Arena is as easy as it sounds. If you’re driving to the Caldwell Night Rodeo Grounds, you must enter the correct GPS coordinates. And you can never get lost, bearing in mind all the rodeo actions you’ll miss if you don’t make it in time.

What is the CNR 2022 Schedule?

Here is the expected schedule Caldwell Night Rodeo for the 2022 event.

Tuesday, 17 August 2021
Time Event
6:30-9:30am Tuesday, August17
9:00am Barrel Racing Slack 1st and 2nd go round
5:30pm Rodeo Gates Open
6:30pm Junior Rodeo and Junior Bull Riding
7:45am Opening Ceremonies
7:55pm First Performance of the 97th annual CNR (Family and First Responder Night)
Wednesday, 18 August 2021
Time Event
6:30-9:30am Buckaroo Breakfast (Sponsored by the Chamber of Commerce)
5:30pm Rodeo Gates Open
6:30pm Junior Rodeo and Junior Bull Riding
7:45pm Opening Ceremonies
7:55pm Second Performance of the 97th annual CNR (Man Up Crusades/Purple Night)
Thursday, 19 August 2021
Time Event
6:30-9:30am Buckaroo Breakfast (Sponsored by the Caldwell Chamber of Commerce)
5:30pm Rodeo Gates Open
6:30pm Junior Rodeo and Junior Bull Riding
7:45pm Opening Ceremonies
7:55pm Third Performance of the 97th annual CNR (Power of Pink Night)
Friday, 20 August 2021
Time Event
6:30-9:30am Buckaroo Breakfast (Sponsored by the Caldwell Chamber of Commerce)
5:30pm Rodeo Gates Open
6:30pm Junior Rodeo and Junior Bull Riding
7:45pm Opening Ceremonies
7:55pm Fourth Performance of the 97th annual CNR (Patriot Night)
Saturday, 21 August 2021
Time Event
7:00-10:00am Buckaroo Breakfast (Sponsored by the Chamber of Commerce)
6:30pm Junior Rodeo Finals
6:45pm Queen Coronation
7:15pm Junior Bulls Finals
7:55pm Final Performance of the 97th annual CNR Top 12 Contestants in Each Event Return for Event Championship

What TV Channel will the CNR be on?

If you want to watch all the main events of the CNR 2022, you’ll need to have access to the Cowboy Channel or the Cowboy Channel Plus App. The Cowboy Channel has been the official broadcaster of the Caldwell Night Rodeo since the network struck a deal with the PRCA. Therefore, you won’t watch CNR on any other TV provider during the live event. The main performances are expected to air live from 3:30 pm to 9:45 pm (ET) during the 5-day event on August 16-20, 2022.

CNR Main Events

Now, it’s clear which platform to use to watch CNR 2022 at the comfort of your home or by visiting the Caldwell Night Rodeo Arena on Aug 16-20.

Let’s highlight the main rodeo performances for the five days.

  • Bareback Bronc Riding
  • Saddle Bronc Riding
  • Tie-Down Roping
  • Steer Wrestling
  • Team Roping
  • Bull Riding
  • Barrels

How to watch Caldwell Night Rodeo Live Stream

Do you have a tight schedule? And you won’t be able to Watch CNR at the Caldwell Night Rodeo Grounds come August 2022? Worry not! We have got you sorted with some helpful information on how to watch CNR anywhere in the world. You can live stream the 5-days performance through the Cowboys Channel Plus at www.cowboyschannelplus.com. Or better yet, you can download the Cowboy Channel Plus app that is readily available for iOS and Android to watch on the go in HD.

The Cowboy Channel

The Cowboy Channel will be available on DIRECTV channel 603. Since December 27, 2017, it has been the first 24-hour network wholly devoted to western lifestyles and western sports. 

Here are some of the platforms you need to access the Cowboy Channel.

  • AT&T (Channel 566)
  • Sling TV’s Heartland Package
  • The Cowboy Channel Plus App
  • Verizon FiOS TV
  • Comcast
  • Suddenlink
  • Charter Spectrum

Click here to know whether you can access THE COWBOY CHANNEL in your area. Choose your Pay-Tv provider after entering your zip code.

RELATED NEWS: Calgary Stampede 2021: Live Stream, TV Schedule, Start time

Can I watch Caldwell Night Rodeo 2022 on Roku, Fire TV, Apple TV, or Chromecast?

Yes, it’s entirely possible to watch CNR Night Rodeo 2022 on TV streaming devices like Chromecast, Apple TV, Fire TV, and Roku. Another great option is the Sling TV, which comes with an app for Android TV that works on most smart TVs, among other devices.

How much do Caldwell Night Rodeo tickets cost?

Tickets prices vary each day during the five days. Here, we have highlighted the ticket price range per day. It would be best to plan and get your tickets early to avoid missing out on them as the event nears.

  • Tuesday – $12.00 – $75.00:
  • Wednesday – $12.00 – $75.00
  • Thursday – $8.00 – $75.00
  • Friday – $25.00 – $80.00
  • Saturday -$25.00 – $85.00

Note: There is an $85 five-day pass. For additional information on ticket prices, click here.

Conclusion

The CNR finals are expected to play on the event’s last day on Saturday, August 20. You may miss the first days, but you won’t want to be left out during the finals as cowboys and cowgirls battle it out for the ultimate prize. You can either watch Caldwell Night Rodeo 2022 from the comfort of your home by subscribing to the Cowboy Channel Plus or download the Cowboy Channel Plus app to watch on the go. Alternatively, you can also visit the Caldwell Night Rodeo Grounds during the five days between August 16-20, 2022.

For more information visit: caldwellnightrodeo.com. Thanks for visiting and for the latest Rodeo sports news visit: fd-uat-autopayroll-app.apps.dfes.wa.gov.au
